Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a red-brown pottery ribbed vessel, the fabric is partly greyish in section, the interior is spotted in parts with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and remains of three lines of black-painted text.
Curator's comments: To be published by J. Cromwell
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394636) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394636)
